name: healthy fantasy
description:
HAI THIS IS A SELF MADE RPG WALKING SIMULATOR GAME WHERE YOU PLAY AS A HELP STUDENT THAT HAS BEEN HIT BY A TRUCK AND REINCARNATED IN A FANTASY WORLD CALLED BABABOEY! . THERES NO OBJECTIVE IN THIS GAME,  NO BOSSES, NO PLOT, JUST FUN AND AND EXCITEMENT!!!!! PLS INTERRACT WITH THE ITEMS AS THERE ARE SOME NUTRITION FACT HIDING SOMEWHERE WAITING FOR YOU TO DISCOVER!!!!!!. THE GAME IS ONLY ABOUT 2 MINS LONG. SEE YOU ON THIS EXCITING ADVENTURE!! ( PLS DONT GET HIT BY A TRUCK)

REQUIREMENTS 

1) SCREENSHOT  THE MOMENT THAT CAUGHT YOUR ATTENTION AND SEND IT TO US VIA INSTAGRAM! ( ALTHOUGH WE ARE NOT SETTING ANY RULES ON WHAT SCREENSHOT YOU SHOULD BE POSING, PLSSSSS LET IT BE RELATED TO HEALTH.)

2)WRITE FEEDBACK TO US VIA OUR INSTAGRAM PAGE OR IN THIS COMMENT SECTION ( PLSS LET US KNOW IF YOU'RE  A  HELP STUDENT OR NOT)

3) STORY IS OPTIONAL BUT WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND YALL TO POST IT!
